name: disjeq12d
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s0, c2, c3)))

stmt.origin: bitrd(w0, wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s0, c2, c3), wdisj(s0, c2, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s0, c2, c3)))

-| wi(w0, wb(wdisj(s0, c2, c1), wdisj(s0, c2, c3)))

|- wi(w0, wb(wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wdisj(s0, c2, c3)))

-| wi(w0, wb(wdisj(s0, c2, c1), wdisj(s0, c2, c3)))

-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:

-| diffsc(s0, c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wdisj(s0, c2, c1), wdisj(s0, c2, c3)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(c1, c3))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:

-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Equality theorem for disjoint collection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)
